description: This file defines interfaces related to warning reporting control and warning events within the WPEFramework. It contains abstract classes and methods for reporting warnings, serializing/deserializing warning data, and managing warning categories.

classes.name: IWarningEvent
classes.description: Interface for a warning event, providing methods for serialization, deserialization, categorization, and warning identification.

classes.name: IWarningReportingUnit
classes.description: Contains nested interface IWarningReportingControl for controlling warning category behavior, and methods for reporting warnings and category management.

classes.name: IWarningReportingUnit::IWarningReportingControl
classes.description: Control interface for a warning category, allowing exclusion, configuration, and cloning of category controls.

methods.name: ReportWarningEvent
methods.description: Method to report a warning event with an identifier and warning information.

methods.name: FetchCategoryInformation
methods.description: Fetches information about a specific warning category, including its default status, enabled state, exclusions, and configuration.

methods.name: AddToCategoryList
methods.description: Adds a warning reporting control to the category list.

methods.name: RemoveFromCategoryList
methods.description: Removes a warning reporting control from the category list.

methods.name: Exclude
methods.description: Excludes a specified category from reporting.

methods.name: Configure
methods.description: Configures a warning reporting category with specific settings.

methods.name: Clone
methods.description: Returns a clone of the warning reporting control.
